Class Main

java.lang.Object
Main
public class Main extends Object
This is a DMS application used to keep track of the albums an individual has listened to along with their associated ratings.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Main.AlbumProperty
    An enum used to select which property should be selected/updated in the updateAlbum() method.
    static class 
    Main.EditWindow
    This class contains the logic used to create the album editing window which is displayed when right-clicking on an album on the main table and selecting the edit option.

    addAlbumToDB(Album album)
    addAlbumToDB takes an Album object and adds it to the DB to be displayed in the main application table

    convertIntToRuntimeString(int runtime)
    convertIntoToRuntimeString() used to convert an album's runtime in seconds to a human-readable format (HH:MM:SS) Example: convertIntToRuntimeString(1264) Output: 21:04

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method for running the application
      Parameters:
      args - An array of String values that are passed to the application. This application does not contain any start parameters.

    • updateTable

      public static void updateTable()
      Method used to update the main application table after making changes to the DB

    • convertIntToRuntimeString

      public static String convertIntToRuntimeString(int runtime)
      convertIntoToRuntimeString() used to convert an album's runtime in seconds to a human-readable format (HH:MM:SS) Example: convertIntToRuntimeString(1264) Output: 21:04
      Parameters:
      runtime - An integer representing the number of seconds in the runtime. This is the value that will be converted to a human-readable time format
      Returns:
      A String representing the runtime in the format of HH:MM:SS

    • isAlbumIdUsed

      public static boolean isAlbumIdUsed(int id)
      isAlbumIdUsed queries the DB to check if an album ID is already in use.
      Parameters:
      id - The integer album ID to check.
      Returns:
      A Boolean where True means that the album ID is already used and False means that it isn't.

    • getAlbumById

      public static Album getAlbumById(int id)
      getAlbumById searches the DB for an album based on the ID provided. If the ID exists in the DB, an Album object of the album with the matching ID is returned.
      Parameters:
      id - The integer album ID to search for.
      Returns:
      An Album object is returned containing information pertaining to the album.

    • addAlbumToDB

      public static void addAlbumToDB(Album album)
      addAlbumToDB takes an Album object and adds it to the DB to be displayed in the main application table
      Parameters:
      album - The Album object that should be added to the DB

    • removeAlbumFromDB

      public static void removeAlbumFromDB(Album albumToRemove)
      removeAlbumFromDB removes an album from the DB and updates the main application table.
      Parameters:
      albumToRemove - The Album object that should be removed from the DB.

    • updateAlbum

      public static void updateAlbum(int albumId, Main.AlbumProperty property, String newValue)
      updateAlbum is an internal function used to update the properties of an album within the DB.
      Parameters:
      albumId - The integer ID of the album that should be updated.
      property - An AlbumProperty enum value that represents which property should be updated.
      newValue - A String of the updated value.
